Introduction

4UI CSS framework make you easier to create styling guide for your app.

Download or$ npm install 4ui-css

Cores

Options

Variable Values Description
$prefix fs- Prefix class

Media query

Variable Values Description
$xxs 554px < 554px
$xs 767 < 767px
$sm 992px < 992px
$md 1200px < 1200px
$lg 1400px 1400px
$xl 1600px 1600px

Mixins & Function

Variable Description
+query-media($value-media) $value-media = xs, sm, md, lg; min-width & max-width
+min-query-media($value-media) $value-media = xs, sm, md, lg; Only min-width
+max-query-media($value-media) $value-media = xs, sm, md, lg; Only max-width
+transition($value) $value = all value property on transition style
+transform($value) $value = all value property on transform style
convertRem($size) Function convert pixel to rem

.fs-bg-primary
.fs-bg-primary-hover
.fs-bg-secondary
.fs-bg-secondary-hover
.fs-bg-black
.fs-bg-grey
.fs-bg-border
.fs-bg-white

Typography

Class Values
.fs-lig-$size .fs-lig = Light font-weight
$size: 12, 14, 16, 18, 21, 24, 28, 32, 48, 72
.fs-reg-$size .fs-reg = Regular font-weight
$size: 12, 14, 16, 18, 21, 24, 28, 32, 48, 72
.fs-smb-$size .fs-smb = Semibold font-weight
$size: 12, 14, 16, 18, 21, 24, 28, 32, 48, 72
.fs-str-$size .fs-str = Bold font-weight
$size: 12, 14, 16, 18, 21, 24, 28, 32, 48, 72

Paragraph

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, mei no audiam molestiae, qui ea solum facilis signiferumque. Impedit verterem ut quo. Vis iisque principes ne, velit quaeque reprehendunt vel an. Lucilius corrumpit adversarium ad nec, sea in consequat scripserit. Mel ut aliquid interesset.

<ul>
  • List item 01
  • List item 02
  • List item 03
  • List item 04
  • List item 05

Images

<img src="$url" class="fs-fluid">

Figures

Variable Values
.fs-figure--$size $size = exlarge, large, medium, small
square
Variable Values
.fs-figure--$size $size = exlarge, large, medium, small
circle = .circle

Grid

Grid auto width

.fs-flex-col-auto
.fs-flex-col-auto
.fs-flex-col-auto
.fs-flex-col-auto
.fs-flex-col-auto
.fs-flex-col-auto

Grid responsive

  • Grid size 1 to 12
  • Grid media query xs , sm , md , lg
  • Write class example: .fs-flex-[grid_size]-[grid_media_query]
.fs-flex-12-sm
.fs-flex-6-sm
.fs-flex-6-sm
.fs-flex-4-sm
.fs-flex-4-sm
.fs-flex-4-sm
.fs-flex-3-sm
.fs-flex-3-sm
.fs-flex-3-sm
.fs-flex-3-sm

Grid offset

  • Grid size 1 to 12
  • Grid media query xs , sm , md , lg
  • Write class example: .fs-offset-[grid_size]-[grid_media_query]
.fs-flex-10-sm .fs-offset-1-sm
.fs-flex-8-sm .fs-offset-2-sm
.fs-flex-6-sm .fs-offset-2-sm

Column

  • Column size 1 to 12
  • Write class example: .fs-column-[column_size]
